id.description: Unique identifier of the custom field.

active.description: Indicates whether the custom field is currently active or not.

field_type.description: Type of the custom field (text, dropdown, etc.).

value_type.description: Type of values accepted by the custom field.

private.description: Indicates if the custom field is for private use only.

required.description: Denotes whether the custom field is required or not.

require_approval.description: Specifies if approval is required for changes to the custom field.

trigger_new_version.description: Indicates if a new version should be triggered upon changes to the custom field.

name_key.description: Key associated with the name of the custom field.

expose_in_job_board_api.description: Specifies if the custom field should be exposed in the job board API.

api_only.description: Denotes if the custom field is used only in API requests.

offices.description: Offices related to the custom field.

departments.description: Departments associated with the custom field.

template_token_string.description: Token string used in templates for the custom field.

custom_field_options.description: List of custom field options available for selection.

id.description: Unique identifier of the custom field option.

name.description: Name of the custom field option.

priority.description: Priority of the custom field option.

external_id.description: External identifier of the custom field option.
